original_text: that you will save alive my father and mother, my brothers and sisters, and all who belong to them, and deliver our lives from death.”
korean_text: 그리고 나의 부모와 나의 남녀 형제와 그들에게 속한 모든 사람을 살려 주어 우리 목숨을 죽음에서 건져내라

sentences.original_text: that you will save alive my father and mother
and all who belong to them
and deliver our lives from death
